title: Ghostship by Pascal Blanché
author: Pascal Blanché

Issue 148 – January 2019Cover ArtGhostshipPascal Blanché is a French artist, with more than twenty-five years of experience in the gaming industry. By day, he works at Behaviour Interactive as Art Director. By night, he likes to work on more personal explorations and build bold new worlds.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
